title: The House of Marley: Chant Portable Audio System
description: Bluetooth® convenience, bamboo trim, minimal size, and truly impressive audio quality. Includes a REWIND™ carry bag, carabiner, and built-in battery. Clip it onto your bag and take it anywhere.

asset.author: TheHouseofMarley
